== Mike Morraye ==

=== About Me ===
Real name: Mike Morraye

Living in the wonderfull city of Ghent, Belgium.

I am one of the Ops at [[http://www.openminds.be/|Openminds].

=== Contribution to Ubuntu ===
As an active member of the Ubuntu-be LoCo team, I lend a hand at almost all Ubuntu-related activity's in Ghent.
I've been advising people and helping them install Ubuntu trough the Ubuntu-be support team.
I organised the 9.04 and lucid lynx Release party in Ghent.
